content:
As an AI language model, I do not have access to the latest information or current events. However, I can provide some examples of initiatives or programs that may have been implemented in Tver or other regions to support small businesses:

1. Small business development centers - these are centers that offer counseling, training, and other resources to small business owners to help them start or grow their business.

2. Access to financing - government agencies or private organizations may provide loans or grants to small businesses to help them with capital or startup costs.

3. Tax incentives - tax breaks or reductions may be offered to small businesses to help them reduce their tax burdens and increase their profits

4. Simplified regulations - some regions may simplify regulations and other bureaucratic procedures to make it easier to start and operate a small business.

5. Infrastructure development - improvements to transportation, communication, and other infrastructure can improve the business environment and increase opportunities for small businesses. 

It is important to note that this list is not exhaustive and initiatives will vary from region to region depending on local needs and resources.
